subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: A punt that hit a video screen exposed a flaw in Jerry Jones’s concept of a game as a live experience and giant living-room set. It is one of several new stadiums with design issues.
snippet: A punt that hit a video screen exposed a flaw in Jerry Jones’s concept of a game as a live experience and giant living-room set. It is one of several new stadiums with design issues.
